product_name: Fall Fortify Plus Liquid Lawn Fertilizer
description:
Fortify your lawn for Fall

Fall Fortify Plus Micronutrients is a winterizing fertilizer formulated to strengthen and maintain lawns from fall into spring.

Our new and improved fall formulation delivers quicker greening, promotes deeper root growth, and helps lawns withstand winter damage. With a precise blend of nitrogen, iron, and manganese, it provides exactly what your lawn needs in the fall for a greener, healthier spring.

A Sunday premium selection

Premium fertilizers, enriched with concentrated nutrients and unique soil enhancers, outperform standard options to deliver superior, long-lasting lawn health.

sections.product_features:
22-0-0 NPK (nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium) fall lawn fertilizer
Extended greening and deeper rooting
Helps resist winter injury and damage
Made without pesticides
Easy hose-on application
Covers up to 5,000 sq. ft.
sections.ingredients:
Nitrogen: For deep rooting, recovery and resilience
Iron: For extended deeper greening
sections.instructions:
Apply in Fall (Aug-Oct) during the morning or evening to a well-hydrated lawn.
Connect the sprayer to the hose and pouch.
Turn on water and apply evenly across your lawn until the entire lawn is covered. A full pouch application takes about 10 minutes.
Let lawn dry fully so nutrients can be absorbed fully. Once the lawn dries, you can get back out on your grass.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
Why does my lawn need fertilizer in fall?
Fertilizing your lawn in the fall extends its green appearance into early winter and strengthens its resistance to injury and disease during the dormant months. It also promotes deeper root growth, leading to a healthier lawn in the spring.
How are Sunday premium liquid fertilizers different?
Sunday's premium liquid fertilizers, originally part of custom lawn care plans, are highly concentrated with nutrients, soil amendments, and specialized ingredients for quick and effective results.
How much lawn fertilizer will I need?
Each fertilizer pouch covers 5,000 sq. ft. per treatment. The number of pouches you'll need depends on your lawn size and the specific application requirements.
How to apply alongside other Sunday products
Sunday fertilizers are designed to complement each other! For liquid fertilizers, wait at least one week between applications. For granular fertilizers, allow 4-6 weeks between treatments. For other lawn care products, apply them after the fertilizer has dried on the lawn.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying?
Our ingredients break down quickly and don’t persist in the environment. After our products dry, you can get back to using your lawn!
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Liquid Lawn Fertilizer Instructions
Get a greener lawn with Sunday's nutrient-rich liquid lawn fertilizers. Follow our easy instructions and application tips for optimal growth and greening across your lawn.
